articles.content: Walmart is offering a four-pack of Tile Mate tags in gray for $38. These trackers retail for $25 each when not on sale (though they often go for around $17), so this represents a 62 percent discount … [+683 chars]

articles.title: ‘Can we put it on your card?’: Server tells birthday party of 15 people the bill can only be split 2 ways. It’s $3,500 - The Daily Dot
articles.description: A user on TikTok has sparked discussion after explaining why he didn’t split the check at a birthday dinner.
articles.content:
